definition: a cereal grain, usually barley, that is kiln-dried after having been germinated by soaking in water, convert into malt
details:
noun
- a cereal grain, usually barley, that is kiln-dried after having been germinated by soaking in water
= example: a cereal grain, usually barley, that is kiln-dried after having been germinated by soaking in water
- a lager of high alcohol content
= synonyms: malt liquor
- a milkshake made with malt powder
= synonyms: malted
verb
- convert into malt
- convert grain into malt
- turn into malt, become malt
- treat with malt or malt extract
= example: treat with malt or malt extract
